body: Just ask me stuff.  I lead an interesting life.
body_tagged: Just ask me stuff.  I lead an interesting life.
title: First AMA

replies.body: @Nintendo  In 2013, my annoying friend is like. "Hey, go play nebula!" over and over again. That was the days of MCZone, but once I started to playing I got hooked and couldn't stop.
replies.body_tagged: @Nintendo  In 2013, my annoying friend is like. "Hey, go play nebula!" over and over again. That was the days of MCZone, but once I started to playing I got hooked and couldn't stop.

replies.body: If you could go on vacation to any place you want in the near future, where would it be?
replies.body_tagged: If you could go on vacation to any place you want in the near future, where would it be?

replies.body: @ Petlas          Cancun, Mexico.  Never been there and i'd love to go.

replies.body: @Clock- Err. Mainly piano and sports. Level 10 in piano and I might be starting up a piano clinic next year to teach youngsters. I also play for a Competitive soccer team, and ODP (Olympic Development Program) soccer team. For baseball, I play on my league's all star team.          (Sorry 'bout braggin')
